name: Detective Readswarm & The Death Of Two
name_original: Detective Readswarm & The Death Of Two
description:
To progress through text click Z or hold Z to skip the text wait.  When investigating make sure to click on all evidence in the crime scene. When interrogating click on evidence in the crime scene to ask a suspect about it. When you feel like you're interrogating click the begin button. Because Detective Readswarm questions the other detective you will have to determine whether their response are correct or incorrect.  Use the Correct & Outrageous buttons to do this! You don't immediately lose health for getting this wrong (heheheheh). Sometimes you'll have to provide a reasoning for your answer by clicking on a specific piece of evidence in the crime scene. I wanted toThe art, music, and story is by me. 




The last question in the game might be a little confusing but think a little bit...(hint: if you're told to roll a dice but there is no dice...what would you do?)
